title: Start
body:
RagTime: Jazz, honey, hope you ain't misbehavin' down there in Kansas.


[[Jazz: You know it, pops. |Intro1]]

[[Jazz: Can't be staying out late. |Intro1]]

title: Intro1
body:
RagTime: That's what I like to hear! When you coming back to New Orleans?


[[Jazz: I'll be down by Christmas time|Intro2]]

title: Intro2
body:
RagTime: Your mother and I can't wait to see you. But you better not come home like another damn dewdropper. Bring something nice!

[[Jazz: Something nice, pops?|Intro3]]

title: Intro3
body:
RagTime: Yeah something nice - you know? Something hot, something cool, with a a bit of swing thrown in for good measure|.

You get me?


[[Jazz: Something hot?|hotJazz]]
[[Jazz: Something cool?|coolJazz]]
[[Jazz: A bit of swing?|swingJazz]]
[[Jazz: Of course, pops|Intro4]]

title: hotJazz
body:
Good old New Orleans Jazz! Hot, brassy, fun.

Can't go wrong with it.

[[Jazz: Gotcha|Intro3]]

title: coolJazz
body:
Jazz and fun under the sun. If you stop by Cali, a tan better not be all you're getting.

[[Jazz: I see|Intro3]]

title: swingJazz
body:
Swing music, bebop and all the good stuff. 

Be sure to check out the jazz scene in the Big Apple when you swing by.

[[Jazz: I see|Intro3]]

title: Intro4
body:
RagTime: I'll see you on the 25th then. I am sure I don't need to tell you what train to catch now do I?

[[Take the A Train|TrainHub]]
<<set $day = 23>>
<<set $NY = false>>
<<set $NO = false>>
<<set $CA = false>>
<<set $bebop = false>>
<<set $swing = false>>
<<set $cool = false>>
<<set $vanilla = false>>
<<set $inventory = 0>>

title: TrainHub
body:
<<silently>>
<<set $day = $day+1>>
<<endsilently>>

Day <<$day>> December 192x.

Choose your destination

<<if $NY is false>>
[[New York|NewYork]]
<<endif>>

<<if $CA = false>>
[[California|California]]
<<endif>>

<<if $NO = false>>
[[New Orleans|NewOrleans]]
<<endif>>

title: NewYork
body:
<<set $NY = true>>
The Apple.

Grand. Mysterious. Busy. So very busy.

Grand Central's got it's fair share of cool cats. But the clubs are where it's really happening.

Where do you want to go?


[[Blue Note|NewYork2]]

[[Birdland|NewYork2]]

[[Smalls Jazz Club|NewYork2]]

title: NewYork2
body:
So this is what your pops meant by Swing.

Energetic. Orderly. Danceable. Very very danceable. 

Hot like New Orleans, but not as brassy. Saxophones - you don't see those everyday

A Dapper Gentleman approaches you.

Dapper Gentleman: Here to take a bite out of the Big Apple?

[[Jazz: I guess|NewYork3]]

title: NewYork3
body:
Dapper Gentleman: Bet you're thinking this is the cat's meow, ain't ya, doll?

[[Jazz: And how!|LikeSwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|DislikeSwing]]

title: LikeSwing
body:
Dapper Stranger: You have fine taste there, pal. You much of a swing dancer?

[[Jazz: Ab-so-lute-ly|StaySwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|SwingFail]]

title: DislikeSwing
body:
???: Finally, a cat that's not afraid to say what's what in this joint.

An energetic individual interjected.

Dapper Gentleman: Beat it, rag-a-muffin. You wouldn't know good music if it bit ya in the bum.

Spike: Go chase yourself, ya sap. 

Spike:You're gonna find out staying in that box isn't as ritzy as you think. 

Spike:And, when you do, I am gonna be waiting right here for ya!

Dapper Gentleman: Keep dreaming, pal.

Spike: So what'll it be, cool cat?

The energetic individual addressed you

Spike: You wanna quit this joint and come listen to something out of this world?

[[Jazz: Lead the way, daddy-O|BebopBar]]

[[Jazz: Lead the way|BebopFail]]

title: BebopBar
body:
Complex harmonies. Complex chord progressions. Improvisatory and spontaneous.

Spike: You like it, cool cat? This is Bebop!!

[[Jazz: I love it!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I can't dance to this|BebopAlmostLoss]]

title: StaySwing
body:
You let the tunes move you across the dance floor. Your dance partner is obviously impressed.

Dapper Gentleman: Hot dawg! You Slay me, doll. I am totally goofy over you. Too bad the bank's closed.
But here, I got something else for ya.

[[Accept gift|GetSwing]]

[[Jazz: No thanks, mac|SwingFail]]

title: SwingFail
body:
Dapper Gentleman: A shame, really. Well, I have to go see a man about a dog. Be seeing ya.

There doesn't seem to be anything else for you to do here.

[[Go back to train|TrainHub]]

title: BebopFail
body:
Spike: Aw Rhatz! That's a disappointment, if ever there was one. 

Well, you have a good evening there, pal.

The energetic individual walked away.

There was nothing left for you to do here.

[[Go back to the train station|TrainHub]]

title: BebopAlmostLoss
body:
Spike: No rules to keep us in the box. Just a cat, and the Blues. 
Spike: Isn't it great? 

[[Jazz: And how!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I am not really feeling it.|BebopFail]]

title: BebopWin
body:
Spike: I knew you'd love it! Here I got something for you.

You received the Spirit of Bebop.

Spike: Put this to good use, cool cat. I'll be seeing you.

[[Go back to the train|TrainHub]]
<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $bebop = true>>

title: GetSwing
body:
You receive THE SPIRIT OF SWING

Dapper Gentleman: Something tells me you got other places you gotta be, doll. 
Dapper Gentleman: You take care now, you hear?

[[Go back to the train|TrainHub]]
<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $swing = true>>

title: California
body:
<<set $CA = true>>
The cool summer breeze carried music tinged with sea-tang.

It was little wonder why musicians here preferred boulevards and beaches to orthodox stages. 

[[Stay awhile and listen|California1]]

title: California1
body:
The soft notes faded in and out, in sync with the gentle ebb and flow of the Pacific Ocean.

They spoke to you of lazy Summer Afternoons and evenings spent staring off into the sea

Seeing your interest one of the musicians waved you down.

Cool cat: You diggin' our tunes, cat?

[[Jazz: What are you playing?|California2]]

[[Jazz: Not really my jam, man|FailCali]]

title: FailCali
body:
Cool Cat: Sorry, but  you just don't got the chill.

[[Go back to the station|TrainHub]]

title: California2
body:
Cool cat: Cool Jazz!! It ain't just an East Coast thing. Wanna jam with us?

[[Jazz: Sure!!|California3]]

[[Jazz: I think I'll pass|FailCali]]

title: California3
body:
You pick up your instrument and start playing along

[[Play it hot|FailCaliMusic]]

[[Play it smooth|CaliforniaWin]]

[[Play it very hot|FailCaliMusic]]

title: FailCaliMusic
body:
Cool Cat: No, no, no! Didn't know you swung like a rusty gate.

[[Continue|FailCali]]

title: CaliforniaWin
body:
Cool Cat: You hit on all sixes there! Here have this.

YOU HAVE RECEIVED THE SPIRIT OF COOL JAZZ

Cool Cat: You've more than earned this!

[[Go back to the Train Station|TrainHub]]
<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $cool = true>>

title: NewOrleans
body:
<<set $NO = true>>
Good ol' New Orleans.

Feels like it's been forever.

Everything looks different. But the tunes -

The tunes are still the same.

Not much left to do but go back home to Storyville.

[[Go home|WalkHome]]

title: WalkHome
body:
On the road home you see a familiar face.

Familiar Face: Jazz! Hey Jazz!!

[[Ignore them:|GetHome]]

[[Jazz: Hey!|TalkToFriend]]

title: GetHome
body:
You make your way home, you knock on the door.

Ragtime: Welcome home, Jazz. You got anything cool for your ol' folks?
<<if $bebop = true>>
[[The Spirit of Bebop|SpiritOfBebop]]
<<endif>>
<<if $swing = true>>
[[The Spirit of Swing|SpiritOfSwing]]
<<endif>>
<<if $cool = true>>
[[The Spirit of Cool Jazz|SpiritOfCoolJazz]]
<<endif>>
<<if $vanilla = true>>
[[The Spirit of New Orleans|SpiritOfNewOrleans]]
<<endif>>
<<if $inventory = 0>>
[[I got nothing|GetOut]]
<<else>>
[[That's all I got|Judgement]]
<<endif>>

title: TalkToFriend
body:
Familiar Face: How's the world been treatin' ya, kid? 

Familiar Face: The bull been keepin their mitts off of ya?

[[Jazz: You know it, pal! How's New Orleans been?|TalkToFriend2]]

[[Jazz: The world's what it is. Copacetic one day, down in the dumps the other|TalkToFriend2]]

title: TalkToFriend2
body:
Familiar Face: Can't be helped, I suppose.

Familiar Face: Say, you still remember the ol' New Orleans Jam?

[[Jazz: I do, why?|TalkToFriend3]]

title: TalkToFriend3
body:
Familiar Face: Got a minute to play with an old pal?

[[Jazz: I should get home|GetHome]]

[[Jazz: For sure!|TalkToFriend4]]

title: TalkToFriend4
body:
Familiar Face: Alright, let's do this!

[[Play a saxophone|NewOrleansFail]]

[[Play the clarient|NewOrleansWin]]

title: NewOrleansFail
body:
Familiar Face: That's not how we do it in New Orleans! You've changed Jazz.

[[Go home|GetHome]]

title: NewOrleansWin
body:
Familiar Face: That's how you do it! You've changed, but you still remember your roots!

Familiar Face: Here, have this

YOU HAVE RECEIVED THE SPIRIT OF JAZZ

Familiar Face: Give my regards to your folks

[[Go home|GetHome]]

<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $vanilla = false>>

title: GetOut
body:
RagTime: Ya got some nerve showing up on my porch with nothing to show but the clothes on your back.

RagTime: Get out, I say, get out!

BAD END

title: Judgement
body:
<<if $satisfaction > 2>>
RagTime: Haha! You never disappoint Jazz. Welcome home!

GOOD END.
<<else>>
RagTime: That's all you got?

[[Jazz: That's all I got.|GetOut]]

<<endif>>

title: SpiritOfBebop
body:
Ahh Bebop! Unrestrained freedom!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfSwing
body:
Swing! Your mother and I will be dancing tonight!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfCoolJazz
body:
I can pracitcally smell the surf! Good job!

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: SpiritOfNewOrleans
body:
New Orleans! Good ol' New Orleans! You really got the spirit of our home there jazz

<<set $satisfaction = $satisfaction+1>>

[[Jazz: I got more|HomeCheck]]

title: HomeCheck
body:
Ragtime: More gifts for your daddy-O?
<<if $bebop = true>>
[[The Spirit of Bebop|SpiritOfBebop]]
<<endif>>
<<if $swing = true>>
[[The Spirit of Swing|SpiritOfSwing]]
<<endif>>
<<if $cool = true>>
[[The Spirit of Cool Jazz|SpiritOfCoolJazz]]
<<endif>>
<<if $vanilla = true>>
[[The Spirit of New Orleans|SpiritOfNewOrleans]]
<<endif>>
<<if $inventory = 0>>
[[I got nothing|GetOut]]
<<else>>
[[That's all I got|Judgement]]
<<endif>>
